tool_description: Extracts text and structural elements from Microsoft Word documents (DOC/DOCX) with formatting and metadata preservation.

doc_path.description: Path to the Word document file

error_messages: Document file not found: The specified document path does not exist.
Unsupported document format: Only DOC and DOCX formats are supported.
Corrupted document: The document file appears to be damaged or corrupted.
Document is password protected: Cannot access password-protected documents.
Insufficient permissions: Unable to read the document file due to access restrictions.
usage: Provide doc_path to extract content. Use boolean flags to control extraction of headers, footers, and tables based on requirements.

extracted_text.description: Main body text extracted from the document

paragraph_count.description: Number of paragraphs found in the document

table_count.description: Number of tables found in the document

has_images.description: Whether the document contains embedded images
